author: Gilbert Godfrey
content: Located in a sus alley, thereâ€™s a good chance youâ€™ll walk by this place if you arenâ€™t looking for it. For Â£7, you get 3 curries & rice at a pretty generous portion. Shoutout to the rice, not sure what they do to make it but it was really good. Curries change everyday but you really canâ€™t go wrong with any of the choices, just pick the ones that look interesting to you. Definitely recommend adding a mountain of onions like I do. Seating is small and the place feels cramped, but adds to the ambience in my opinion. One improvement Iâ€™d like to see is for them to be a bit more generous with the protein, but otherwise, a staple in my list of places to eat in ManchesterğŸ‘
